page.title: 18Local Surnames
page.content: The families who now live in Baltasound are usually people whose families moved into the area from north or south of the island.The oldest residents are probably the laird's family-the Edmonstons Saxbys who have been here at least 150 years. Originally local names followed the Viking system of using Patronyms,where the child took the fathers Christian name as a surname.e.g.fathers name {John}son's name James{Johnson.}So there are a lot of such names like {Hughson,Henderson,Johnson,Robertson and{Thomson}though the Patronym system has died out. To avoid confusion people were often given nicknames like Jim o'the Point because he lives out at the point of Skeo Taing. These nicknames are widely used today.
